title: Winter Wonderland

title: One, two, drink
body: Choose a player. Both of you need to close your eyes. Count down from three and both of you need to show a finger count that is either one or two. Should you both show the same number, both take a shot!

title: Double Doomed!
body: Choose two players. Either both draw a card or both take a shot!

title: Will it fit?

title: Spice level 100
body: Another player can choose to do something sexual to you. They can choose what they will do to you or you drink 5. If nobody wants to do it, everybody drinks 2

title: Escape room
body: Leave the room with the person to your right. The game continues without you two. As long as you're making out, you can stay out of the room. Should you decide not to leave the room, both of you drink 5

title: Don't be inappropriate
